thread.title: West Bengal Govt Jobs 2017 – Lab Attendant & Kala Azar Technical Supervisor Posts
thread.title_full: West Bengal Govt Jobs 2017 – Lab Attendant & Kala Azar Technical Supervisor Posts

author: publisher12
title: West Bengal Govt Jobs 2017 – Lab Attendant & Kala Azar Technical Supervisor Posts
text: Click here for Kala Azar Technical Supervisor Post Details College of Medicine & Sagore Dutta Hospital Kolkata Jobs 2017 – Lab Attendant Posts: Government of West Bengal, Otfice of the Principal, College of Medicine and Sagore Dutta Hospital, Kolkata has invited applications for the recruitment of Laboratory Attendant (Dome)vacancies on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 28-02-2017 within 04:00 pm. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… College of Medicine & Sagore Dutta Hospital Kolkata Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Laboratory Attendant (Dome) Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18 to 40 years as on 31-03-2017. Age relaxation is applicable by 5 years for SC/ ST, 3 years for OBC candidates as per govt rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Class Vlll passed & relevant experience. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications along with selt-attested copies of testimonials and documents to the Principal, College of Medicine and Sagore Dutta Hospital 578, 8.T Road, Kamarhati, Kotkata- 700058 on or before 28-02-2017 within 04:00 pm. Last Date for Receipt of Applications: 28-02-2017 within 04:00 pm. For more details like experience & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - CMOH Dakshin Dinajpur Jobs 2017 – Walk in for Kala Azar Technical Supervisor Posts: Government of West Bengal, Office of the Chief Medical Officer of Health (CMOH), Dakshin Dinajpur has published notification for the recruitment of Kala Azar Technical Supervisor vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 17-02-2017 at 10:00 am. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… CMOH Dakshin Dinajpur Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Kala Azar Technical Supervisor Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 50 – 62 years. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Degree with Science. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may walk in interview with original and photocopy of the medical fitness certificate, qualification certificate and 02 wheeler driving license certificates and 02 copies of passport size photos on 17-02-2017 at 10:00 am. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 17-02-2017 at 10:00 am. Venue: Office of the CMOH, D/ Dinajpur. For more details like salary, experience & other information click on the link given below…
